StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPersonbySSN]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SSN char(9) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @PERSON_DATA TABLE (ORGANIZATION_ID INT NULL, PERSON_ID INT NULL, LAST_NAME VARCHAR(20) NULL, FIRST_NAME VARCHAR(20) NULL, MIDDLE_NAME VARCHAR(20) NULL, SUFFIX VARCHAR(5), SSN CHAR(9) NULL, RS VARCHAR(45) NULL, RSS VARCHAR(45) NULL, RANK VARCHAR(10) NULL)
INSERT INTO @PERSON_DATA (ORGANIZATION_ID, PERSON_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_NAME, SUFFIX, SSN, RS, RSS, RANK) SELECT R1.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID, P.PERSON_ID, ISNULL(P.LAST_NAME,'') AS LAST_NAME, ISNULL(P.FIRST_NAME,'') AS FIRST_NAME, ISNULL(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME,'') AS MIDDLE_NAME, ISNULL(P.SUFFIX_CD,'') AS SUFFIX, ISNULL(P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER,'') AS SSN, COALESCE(R2.NAME, R1.SHORT_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS RS, COALESCE(R1.NAME, SPACE(0)) AS RSS, LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) AS RANK FROM PERSON P WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN NWA ON (P.PERSON_ID = NWA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN) INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION R1 ON NWA.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = R1.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON R1.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION R2 ON OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = R2.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RECRUITING_PERSON RP ON RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = P.PERSON_ID
--- RETURN THE DATA SELECT P.ORGANIZATION_ID, P.PERSON_ID, P.LAST_NAME, P.FIRST_NAME, P.MIDDLE_NAME, P.SUFFIX, P.SSN, P.RS, P.RSS, P.RANK FROM @PERSON_DATA P
SET NOCOUNT OFF
